mapper.select: SELECT info_name, info_birth, info_gender, info_phone FROM INFO WHERE info_seq=#{info_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INFO(info_seq, info_name, info_birth, info_gender, info_phone) VALUES(#{info_seq}, #{info_name}, #{info_birth}, #{info_gender}, #{info_phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE INFO SET (info_name, info_birth, info_gender, info_phone)=(#{info_name}, #{info_birth}, #{info_gender}, #{info_phone}) WHERE info_seq=#{info_seq}
